title: Dark Lance
summaries: The Dark Lance is a spear that can be found in Shadow Chests in the Underworld. It can also be found in the Obsidian Lock Box(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) found in Obsidian Crates(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) and Hellstone Crates(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions). It is currently the strongest pre-Hardmode spear. It can pierce through enemies, and even hit the same enemy multiple times and (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) has a chance to inflict them with the Shadowflame debuff. When used, it gives off light emitting particles that linger for a while, which is useful for fighting in the dark. (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) It creates a small shockwave at the end of its tip when used.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.
